channel.title: Comments on: Nokia unveils flagship Windows 8 smartphone Lumia 920
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Please stop announcing products that aren’t ready to launch. – Ray’s Rants | Deemable Tech
item.dc:creator: Please stop announcing products that aren’t ready to launch. – Ray’s Rants | Deemable Tech
item.description: [...] Ray HollisterYesterday, both Nokia and Motorola announced their latest flagship phones, the Lumia 920 and the Droid RAZR HD respectively. Both of them seem like they will be quite impressive phones [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Ray HollisterYesterday, both Nokia and Motorola announced their latest flagship phones, the Lumia 920 and the Droid RAZR HD respectively. Both of them seem like they will be quite impressive phones […]

item.title: By: Ray Hollister
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description: I want to get excited about this phone, but seriously, <a href="http://dmbl.co/2t" title="Ray's Rants - Please stop announcing products that aren't ready to launch. | Deemable Tech" rel="nofollow">why can't they give us a price and an availability date</a>? And, the fake pictures and videos are just rediculous. That's false advertising, plain and simple.
item.content:encoded: I want to get excited about this phone, but seriously, why can’t they give us a price and an availability date? And, the fake pictures and videos are just rediculous. That’s false advertising, plain and simple.
